row.name: UC4RB_VSP_DELETE_PERMANENTLY#
row.xui: <dynradiogroup alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="" id="UC4RB_VSP_DELETE_PERMANENTLYs.00" nl="1" text="Delete Permanently" tooltip="'Yes' indicates that you want to delete the virtual machines not only from the inventory, but from the datastore." required="0"> <properties> <entry listparam="C,N" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> <entry name="text">Delete Permanently</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_VSP_DELETE_PERMANENTLYs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">'Yes' indicates that you want to delete the virtual machines not only from the inventory, but from the datastore.</entry> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="initvalue"/> </properties> </dynradiogroup>
